title: Wolfenstein 3D E1 (I Am Death Incarnate) [7:12] (RTA) [5:46] (In-game)
description: Well after 160+ attempts I finished my first run of Episode 1 on the hardest difficulty. This game is really fun but also pretty punishing. Lots of RNG with all the hitscan bullshit but I dunno it's a fun challenge.
